title: Livestream: Testimony continues on Day 3 of Brian Walshe murder trial
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime Trooper Nicholas Guarino, who uncovered damning internet searches on Walshe’s devices, returns to the stand.
Livestream via NBC10 Boston.
Trooper Nicholas Guarino, who revealed the damning internet searches attributed to Brian Walshe, returns to the stand at Norfolk Superior Court on Wednesday for cross-examination in the murder trial.

title: Jordan Walsh earns ‘grown man’ compliment from Jaylen Brown after recent surge
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics "It's amazing to see, just him coming out of his shell, being aggressive.
He's learning every day.

" Jordan Walsh AP Photo/Charles Krupa The hustle and tenacity that Jordan Walsh showed on the glass during the fourth quarter on Tuesday helped the Celtics knock off one of the tougher opponents in the Eastern Conference.

title: Jaylen Brown’s 42-point outburst leads Celtics over Knicks in thrilling win: 7 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Boston Celtics “I didn’t really like my first quarter,” Brown said, simply.
“So I had to come back out and make up for it in the second quarter.
” The Boston Celtics bench and fans react after Celtics guard Derrick White made a 3-pointer in the third quarter of the win against the Knicks.

title: ‘ICE was here’: Dedham church’s Nativity scene protests immigration crackdown
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The Nativity scene holds "the mirror up to what’s happening," Father Stephen Josoma said.
The Nativity scene at St.
Susanna Parish, missing the baby Jesus, with a protest sign saying "ICE was here.

title: The Bruins keep on fighting. It may not be enough to overcome these injuries.
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "The guys battled.
I don't know, for some reason we can't stay healthy.
" Charlie McAvoy and David Pastrnak remain on the mend due to injuries.

title: East Bridgewater man sentenced to life in prison for 2022 fatal stabbing
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Crime Tishaun Miller, 44, was sentenced to life in prison without parole for the murder of Douglas Rose in 2022, officials said.
An East Bridgewater man was found guilty of first degree murder in the 2022 fatal stabbing of a 41-year-old Falmouth man, officials announced Tuesday.
Tishaun Miller, 44, was sentenced by the Barnstable Superior Court to life in prison without parole for the murder of Douglas Rose, Cape & Islands District Attorney Robert J.

title: Jeff Passan sets odds of Red Sox trading Jarren Duran, Wilyer Abreu
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "The Red Sox are valuing Duran more like the seven-win player of 2024 than his 4-win version in 2025.
" Both Jarren Duran and Wilyer Abreu could be on the trade block this offseason.
John Tlumacki/Globe Staff Something’s got to give in the Red Sox outfield this offseason.

title: A reader questions others’ choices in car brands
author: John Paul
bullets: How To John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, hears from a reader who can’t understand why anyone would buy anything other than a Toyota or Honda.
The Car Doctor hears from a reader who can’t understand why anyone would buy anything other than a Toyota or Honda.
Brandon Bell/Getty Images By John Paul December 2, 2025 4 minutes to read Q.

title: Sonny Gray’s new Red Sox teammates approve of his anti-Yankees commentary
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "I think growing up for me personally I wasn’t a huge fan of theirs.
" Sonny Gray spent parts of two seasons pitching for the Yankees.

title: Patriots’ rematch with Bills reportedly won’t be flexed to primetime
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots will clinch the AFC East if they beat the Bills in Week 15.
Drake Maye and the Patriots beat Josh Allen and the Bills in October.
